DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety performance VYC-25L hyaluronic acid injectable gel restoration creation facial volume participant seek increase projection chin and/or jaw .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Hyaluronic Acid Injectable Gel ( VYC-25L ) Restoration Creation Facial Volume Chin Jaw
DOC.criteria: Has chin retrusion . Has ever receive planning receive permanent facial implant study . Has tattoo , piercings , facial hair scar would interfere visual assessment chin jaw . Has dentures device cover part palate plan undergo dental procedure prophylaxis study . Has undergone semipermanent dermal filler treatment chin jaw within 36 month plan treatment study . Has undergone surgery chin jaw area within 24 month plan surgery study . Has undergone mesotherapy , cosmetic resurfacing , botulinum toxin injection within 6 month plan treatment study . Has experience trauma chin jaw area within 6 month . Has previously diagnose streptococcal disease . Has history anaphylaxis allergy lidocaine , hyaluronic acid streptococcal protein . Has porphyria untreated epilepsy . Has active autoimmune disease . Has current cutaneous mucosal inflammatory infectious process , abscess , unhealed wound , cancerous precancerous lesion . Is concurrent regimen lidocaine structurallyrelated local anesthetic concurrent regimen drug reduce inhibit hepatic metabolism . Has impair cardiac conduction , severely impaired hepatic function , severe renal dysfunction . Is ongoing regimen anticoagulation therapy . Is ongoing regimen medication ( eg , aspirin , ibuprofen ) substances known increase coagulation time ( eg , herbal supplement garlic gingko biloba ) within past 10 day . Has begin use overthecounter prescription oral topical , antiwrinkle product subnasale within 30 day enrollment plan begin use product study .
